Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS=0.00001
dim tshow_weld[] dim ishow_weld[] : i=0 i=i+1 : ishow_weld[i]=0 : tshow_weld[i] = "Нет" i=i+1 : ishow_weld[i]=1 : tshow_weld[i] = "Условно" i=i+1 : ishow_weld[i]=2 : tshow_weld[i] = "Тело"
max_type = 12 if vardim1(hide_type)<>max_type or vardim1(show_type)<>max_type then dim t[] for i = 1 to max_type t[i] = "" next i hide_type = t show_type = t parameters show_type = show_type, hide_type = hide_type endif
Symbol.Script_UI:
ui_dialog `Kuvbur_КМ Общие параметры`, 600, 410 UI_PAGE 1 sxe = 250 symax = 10 sx = 5 sy = symax sy = sy + 30: UI_OUTFIELD `Выделение цветом в 3д`, sx, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "mat_by_type", sx+135, sy-3, 260, 20
sy = sy + 40: UI_OUTFIELD `Не специфицировать элементы с ID, содержащим`, sx, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "ignore_id", sx+270, sy-3, 60, 20
if mat_by_type_code<>1 then UI_OUTFIELD `Покрытие`, sx+340, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "ignore_mat", sx+400, sy-3, 180, 20 endif
sy = sy + 20: UI_GROUPBOX "Номер/имя вида (0-видны все эл-ты)", sx, sy, 270, 40 UI_INFIELD "n_view", sx+5, sy+15, 260, 20
sy = sy + 30
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать ось элементов`, sx+20, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_axsis", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать ТОЛЬКО ось элементов`, sx+20, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_only_axsis", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать элементы узлов`, sx+20, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_connect", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать элементы крепления(болты, гайки)`, sx+20, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_crew", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать отверстия болтов`, sx+20, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_hole", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать фасонки`, sx+20, sy, 0, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_list", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_GROUPBOX "Фильтрация по углу поворота", sx, sy, 270, 85 sx = sx +10 sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Вертикальные элементы`, sx+20, sy, 160, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_if_vert", sx, sy-3, 20, 20 sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Горизонтальные элементы`, sx+20, sy, 160, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_if_gor", sx, sy-3, 20, 20 sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Наклонные элементы`, sx+20, sy, 160, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_if_ang", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sx = 350 sy = symax+30+40+20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать не специфицируемые`, sx+20, sy, 200, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_ingore", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать изделия`, sx+20, sy, 200, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_izd", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать элементы КМ`, sx+20, sy, 200, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_metall", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 40: UI_OUTFIELD `Уровень детализации`, sx+95, sy, 120, 20 UI_INFIELD "gs_detlevel_3D", sx, sy-3, 90, 20 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` then sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Показ сварочных швов`, sx+95, sy, 150, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_weld", sx, sy-3, 90, 20 if show_weld = 1 then sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Высота штриха, мм`, sx+95, sy, 150, 20 UI_INFIELD "weld_L_strih_mm", sx, sy-3, 90, 20 sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Шаг штриха, мм`, sx+95, sy, 150, 20 UI_INFIELD "weld_Step_strih_mm", sx, sy-3, 90, 20 endif if show_weld = 2 then sy = sy + 30: UI_OUTFIELD "Автоматическая", sx+92, sy, 90, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} weld_mat_arr[1], sx, sy-3, 90, 25 sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD "Ручная", sx+92, sy, 90, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} weld_mat_arr[2], sx, sy-3, 90, 25 endif endif
! go to next-previous page buttons ui_button ui_prev, " << ", 5,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page - 1 ui_button ui_next, " >> ", 50,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page + 1 n_page = 1 if mat_by_type_code=1 then goto 301 n_page = n_page + 1 sx = 0 sy = 40 sxe = 250 UI_PAGE n_page, -1, mat_by_type UI_OUTFIELD mat_by_type, sx+20, sy+5, 260, 20 ui_button ui_prev, " << ", 5,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page - 1 ui_button ui_next, " >> ", 50,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page + 1
!!--------------- Антикоррозийка ------------------------ if mat_by_type_code = 2 then for i=1 to vardim1(cov_type_arr) sy = sy + 40: UI_OUTFIELD cov_type_arr[i], sx+20, sy, 90, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} cov_mat_arr[i], sx+120, sy-3, 200, 25 next i endif
!!-------------------- Огнезащита ----------------------- if mat_by_type_code = 3 then for i=1 to vardim1(fire_keep_type_arr) sy = sy + 40: UI_OUTFIELD fire_keep_type_arr[i], sx+20, sy, 180, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} fire_keep_mat_arr[i], sx+210, sy-3, 200, 25 next i endif
!!--------------- Типы конструкций ---------------------- if mat_by_type_code = 4 then for i=1 to vardim1(konstr_type_arr) sy = sy + 30: UI_OUTFIELD konstr_type_arr[i], sx+20, sy, 150, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} konstr_mat_arr[i], sx+150, sy-3, 200, 25 next i endif
!!------------------ Огнестойкость ---------------------- if mat_by_type_code = 5 then for i=1 to vardim1(fire_type_arr) sy = sy + 35: UI_OUTFIELD fire_type_arr[i], sx+20, sy, 310, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} fire_mat_arr[i], sx+310, sy-3, 200, 25 next i endif
!!------------------- Марка стали ----------------------- if mat_by_type_code = 6 then sxd = 0 for i=1 to vardim1(stal_type_arr) sy = sy + 30: UI_OUTFIELD stal_type_arr[i], sx+sxd+20, sy, 60, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} stal_mat_arr[i], sx+90+sxd, sy-3, 80, 25 if i mod 11 = 0 then sy = 40 sxd = sxd + 90+80 endif next i endif
!!--------------- Тип спецификации ---------------------- if mat_by_type_code = 7 then for i=1 to vardim1(type_spec_type_arr) sy = sy + 30: UI_OUTFIELD type_spec_type_arr[i], sx+20, sy, 150, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} type_spec_mat_arr[i], sx+150, sy-3, 200, 25 next i endif
!!---------------- Тип элемента ------------------------ if mat_by_type_code = 8 then for i=1 to vardim1(connect_type_arr) sy = sy + 30: UI_OUTFIELD connect_type_arr[i], sx+20, sy, 150, 20 UI_INFIELD{3} connect_mat_arr[i], sx+150, sy-3, 200, 25 next i endif 301: n_page = n_page + 1 sx = 20 sy = 40 sxe = 250 UI_PAGE n_page, -1, "Фильтрация по типам" UI_OUTFIELD "Фильтрация по типам конструкций", sx+100, sy-25, 260, 20 UI_OUTFIELD "Фильтровать по типам конструкций", sx+20, sy, 200, 25 UI_INFIELD "filter_type", sx, sy-5, 20, 25
sx = 20 sy = sy + 25 UI_OUTFIELD "Скрыть выбранные", sx+40, sy, 200, 25 for i=1 to vardim1(hide_type) sy = sy + 25 UI_INFIELD{3} hide_type[i], sx, sy, 200, 20 next i
sx = 260 sy = 40 sy = sy + 25 UI_OUTFIELD "Отобразить только выбранные", sx+20, sy, 200, 25 for i=1 to vardim1(show_type) sy = sy + 25 UI_INFIELD{3} show_type[i], sx, sy, 200, 20 next i
ui_button ui_prev, " << ", 5,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page - 1 ui_button ui_next, " >> ", 50,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page + 1
303: if not(show_crew) then goto 302 n_page = n_page + 1 sx = 0 sy = 40 sxe = 250 UI_PAGE n_page, -1, "Отображение болтов" UI_OUTFIELD "Отображение болтов", sx+100, sy-25, 260, 20
UI_OUTFIELD "Отображать все болты", sx+20, sy, 130, 25 UI_INFIELD "bolt_show_all", sx, sy-5, 20, 25
ui_button ui_prev, " << ", 5,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page - 1 ui_button ui_next, " >> ", 50,symax, 32,21, gs_ui_current_page + 1 if bolt_show_all=0 then sy = sy + 20 UI_OUTFIELD "Угол-1 от/до", sx+20, sy, 100, 20 UI_OUTFIELD "Угол-2 от/до", sx+130, sy, 100, 20 UI_OUTFIELD "Спереди", sx+215, sy, 100, 20 UI_OUTFIELD "Сбоку", sx+270, sy, 100, 20 UI_OUTFIELD "Скрыть", sx+310, sy, 100, 20
for i=1 to vardim1(bolt_ang1) sy = sy + 20 UI_INFIELD{3} bolt_ang1[i][1], sx, sy, 45, 25 UI_INFIELD{3} bolt_ang1[i][2], sx+50, sy, 45, 25 UI_INFIELD{3} bolt_ang2[i][1], sx+120, sy, 45, 25 UI_INFIELD{3} bolt_ang2[i][2], sx+170, sy, 45, 25 UI_INFIELD{3} bolt_top[i], sx+240, sy, 20, 25 UI_INFIELD{3} bolt_side[i], sx+280, sy, 20, 25 UI_INFIELD{3} bolt_hide[i], sx+320, sy, 20, 25 next i sy = sy + 30 UI_OUTFIELD "Инверсия выбора", sx+220, sy+6, 100, 25 UI_INFIELD "bolt_hide_inv", sx+320, sy, 20, 25
UI_OUTFIELD "Очистить значения", sx+20, sy+6, 120, 25 UI_INFIELD "bolt_sbr", sx, sy, 20, 25 endif
302: end
Symbol.Script_VL:
dim arr_t[] values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Простой`,`Детальный`,`Откл.`
if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` or gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` then LOCK "show_weld", "show_list" endif
dim mat_by_type_code_t[] : i=0 dim mat_by_type_t[] : i=0 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "Не выделять" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 1 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "По типу антикоррозийной защиты" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 2 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "По типу огнезащиты" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 3 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "По группе(типу) конструкций" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 4 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "По огнестойкости" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 5 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "По марке стали" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 6 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "По типу спецификации" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 7 i=i+1 : mat_by_type_t[i] = "Элементы узлов/основные элементы" : mat_by_type_code_t[i] = 8 values "mat_by_type" mat_by_type_t var = mat_by_type : arr_t = mat_by_type_t : gosub "get_inx" if inx>0 then mat_by_type_code = mat_by_type_code_t[inx] else mat_by_type_code = 0 endif parameters mat_by_type_code = mat_by_type_code
if not(filter_type) then LOCK "hide_type", "show_type" else dim t1[] : t1[1]=" " : j = 0 for i=1 to vardim1(hide_type) if hide_type[i]<>" " and hide_type[i]<>"*" and strlen(hide_type[i])>0 then j = j + 1 space = " " : var = hide_type[i] : gosub "trim_space" space = " " : var = var : gosub "trim_space" t1[j] = STRTOLOWER(var) endif next i parameters hide_type_clear = t1
dim t2[] : t2[1]="*" : j = 0 for i=1 to vardim1(show_type) if show_type[i]<>" " and show_type[i]<>"*" and strlen(show_type[i])>0 then j = j + 1 space = " " : var = show_type[i] : gosub "trim_space" space = " " : var = var : gosub "trim_space" t2[j] = STRTOLOWER(show_type[i]) endif next i parameters show_type_clear = t2 endif !!------------------------------------------------------- !!--------------- Антикоррозийка ------------------------ !!------------------------------------------------------- dim cov_type_arr[] : i=0 i=i+1 : cov_type_arr[i] = "Нет" i=i+1 : cov_type_arr[i] = "тип 1" i=i+1 : cov_type_arr[i] = "тип 2" i=i+1 : cov_type_arr[i] = "тип 3" i=i+1 : cov_type_arr[i] = "тип 4" n_cov = i parameters cov_type_arr = cov_type_arr if vardim1(cov_mat_arr)<>n_cov then dim cov_mat_arr_t[] min_n = max(vardim1(cov_mat_arr), n_cov) max_n = max(vardim1(cov_mat_arr), n_cov) for i=1 to min_n cov_mat_arr_t[i] = cov_mat_arr[i] next i for i=min_n+1 to max_n cov_mat_arr_t[i] = 0 next i parameters cov_mat_arr = cov_mat_arr_t endif !!-------------------------------------------------------
!!------------------------------------------------------- !!-------------------- Огнезащита ----------------------- !!------------------------------------------------------- dim fire_keep_type_arr[] : i=0 i = i + 1 : fire_keep_type_arr[i] = "Не требует защиты" i = i + 1 : fire_keep_type_arr[i] = "Обеспечивается металлом" i = i + 1 : fire_keep_type_arr[i] = "Тонкослойная огнезащита" i = i + 1 : fire_keep_type_arr[i] = "Конструктивная огнезащита" n_fire_keep = i parameters fire_keep_type_arr=fire_keep_type_arr if vardim1(fire_keep_mat_arr)<>n_fire_keep then dim fire_keep_mat_arr_t[] min_n = max(vardim1(fire_keep_mat_arr), n_fire_keep) max_n = max(vardim1(fire_keep_mat_arr), n_fire_keep) for i=1 to min_n fire_keep_mat_arr_t[i] = fire_keep_mat_arr[i] next i for i=min_n+1 to max_n fire_keep_mat_arr_t[i] = 0 next i parameters fire_keep_mat_arr = fire_keep_mat_arr_t endif !!-------------------------------------------------------
!!------------------------------------------------------- !!--------------- Типы конструкций ---------------------- !!------------------------------------------------------- dim konstr_type_arr[] : i=0 i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Балки" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Колонны" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Прогоны" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Фермы" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Емкости" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Связи" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Фахверки" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Площадки" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Лестницы" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Подкрановые пути" i = i + 1 : konstr_type_arr[i] = "Прочее" n_konstr = i parameters konstr_type_arr=konstr_type_arr if vardim1(konstr_mat_arr)<>n_konstr then dim konstr_mat_arr_t[] min_n = max(vardim1(konstr_mat_arr), n_konstr) max_n = max(vardim1(konstr_mat_arr), n_konstr) for i=1 to min_n konstr_mat_arr_t[i] = konstr_mat_arr[i] next i for i=min_n+1 to max_n konstr_mat_arr_t[i] = 0 next i parameters konstr_mat_arr = konstr_mat_arr_t endif !!-------------------------------------------------------
!!------------------------------------------------------- !!------------------ Огнестойкость ---------------------- !!------------------------------------------------------- dim fire_type_arr[] : i=0 i = i + 1 : fire_type_arr[i] = "Несущие конструкции" i = i + 1 : fire_type_arr[i] = "Стены лестничных клеток" i = i + 1 : fire_type_arr[i] = "Стропильные конструкции бесчердачного покрытия" i = i + 1 : fire_type_arr[i] = "Настил бесчердачного покрытия" i = i + 1 : fire_type_arr[i] = "Межэтажные перекрытия" i = i + 1 : fire_type_arr[i] = "Марши и площадки лестниц" i = i + 1 : fire_type_arr[i] = "Не требует защиты" n_fire = i parameters fire_type_arr=fire_type_arr if vardim1(fire_mat_arr)<>n_fire then dim fire_mat_arr_t[] min_n = max(vardim1(fire_mat_arr), n_fire) max_n = max(vardim1(fire_mat_arr), n_fire) for i=1 to min_n fire_mat_arr_t[i] = fire_mat_arr[i] next i for i=min_n+1 to max_n fire_mat_arr_t[i] = 0 next i parameters fire_mat_arr = fire_mat_arr_t endif !!-------------------------------------------------------
!!!------------------------------------------------------- !!!------------------- Марка стали ----------------------- !!!------------------------------------------------------- dim stal_type_arr[] : stal_type_arr[1] = "" dim stal_gost_arr[] : stal_gost_arr[1] = "" : i=0
var1 = " ": var2 = " " ch1 = open("text", "Сталь.txt", "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") i = 1 11: n = input (ch1, i, 1, var1, var2) if n <> -1 then if vartype(var1)=2 and vartype(var2)=2 then stal_type_arr[i] = var1 stal_gost_arr[i] = var2 endif i = i + 1 goto 11 else goto "close1" endif "close1": close ch1
n_stal = i parameters stal_type_arr=stal_type_arr, stal_gost_arr=stal_gost_arr if vardim1(stal_mat_arr)<>n_stal then dim stal_mat_arr_t[] min_n = max(vardim1(stal_mat_arr), n_stal) max_n = max(vardim1(stal_mat_arr), n_stal) for i=1 to min_n stal_mat_arr_t[i] = stal_mat_arr[i] next i for i=min_n+1 to max_n stal_mat_arr_t[i] = 0 next i parameters stal_mat_arr = stal_mat_arr_t endif !!!-------------------------------------------------------
!!------------------------------------------------------- !!--------------- Тип спецификации ---------------------- !!------------------------------------------------------- dim type_spec_type_arr[] : i=0 i = i + 1 : type_spec_type_arr[i] = "Металл" i = i + 1 : type_spec_type_arr[i] = "Изделие" i = i + 1 : type_spec_type_arr[i] = "Не специфицировать" n_type_spec = i parameters type_spec_type_arr=type_spec_type_arr if vardim1(type_spec_mat_arr)<>n_type_spec then dim type_spec_mat_arr_t[] min_n = max(vardim1(type_spec_mat_arr), n_type_spec) max_n = max(vardim1(type_spec_mat_arr), n_type_spec) for i=1 to min_n type_spec_mat_arr_t[i] = type_spec_mat_arr[i] next i for i=min_n+1 to max_n type_spec_mat_arr_t[i] = 0 next i parameters type_spec_mat_arr = type_spec_mat_arr_t endif parameters type_spec_mat_arr[3] = ignore_mat !!-------------------------------------------------------
!!------------------------------------------------------- !!----------------- Тип элемента ------------------------ !!------------------------------------------------------- dim connect_type_arr[] : i=0 i = i + 1 : connect_type_arr[i] = "Элемент узла" i = i + 1 : connect_type_arr[i] = "Основной элемент" parameters connect_type_arr=connect_type_arr !!-------------------------------------------------------
!!------------------------------------------------------- !!--------------------- Болты --------------------------- !!------------------------------------------------------- n_type_b = 15 if vardim1(bolt_ang1)<>n_type_b or bolt_sbr then dim bolt_ang_t[][] dim bolt_top_t[] for i=1 to n_type_b bolt_ang_t[i][1] = 0 bolt_ang_t[i][2] = 0 bolt_top_t[i]=0 next i parameters bolt_ang1 = bolt_ang_t, bolt_ang2 = bolt_ang_t, bolt_top=bolt_top_t, bolt_side=bolt_top_t, bolt_hide=bolt_top_t, bolt_sbr=0 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "bolt_top" then for i=1 to n_type_b if bolt_top[i] then bolt_side[i]=0 bolt_hide[i]=bolt_hide_inv endif next i parameters bolt_side=bolt_side, bolt_hide=bolt_hide endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "bolt_side" then for i=1 to n_type_b if bolt_side[i] then bolt_top[i]=0 bolt_hide[i]=bolt_hide_inv endif next i parameters bolt_top=bolt_top, bolt_hide=bolt_hide endif !!-------------------------------------------------------
values{2} "show_weld" ishow_weld, tshow_weld
end "get_inx": inx = 0 for i=1 to vardim1(arr_t) if var = arr_t[i] then inx = i next i return
"trim_space": if vartype(var) = 2 then DO is_trim = 0 lvar = strlen(var) is_first_space = (strstr(STRSUB (var, 1, 1),space)>0) is_end_space = (strstr(STRSUB (var, lvar, 1),space)>0) if is_first_space then var = STRSUB (var, 2, lvar-1) lvar = strlen(var) endif if is_end_space then var = STRSUB (var, 1, lvar-1) is_trim = is_first_space + is_end_space WHILE is_trim <> 0 endif return
